description: Commands to manage the authorizations of an ExpressRoute Circuit for a private cloud.

commands.name: az vmware authorization create
commands.summary: Create an ExpressRoute Circuit Authorization in a private cloud.
commands.syntax:
az vmware authorization create --authorization-name
                               --private-cloud
                               --resource-group
                               [--express-route-id]
                               [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]

commands.name: az vmware authorization delete
commands.summary: Delete an ExpressRoute Circuit Authorization in a private cloud.
commands.syntax:
az vmware authorization delete [--authorization-name]
                               [--ids]
                               [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                               [--private-cloud]
                               [--resource-group]
                               [--subscription]
                               [--yes]

commands.name: az vmware authorization list
commands.summary: List ExpressRoute Circuit Authorizations in a private cloud.

commands.name: az vmware authorization show
commands.summary: Get an ExpressRoute Circuit Authorization by name in a private cloud.

commands.name: az vmware authorization wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
